creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
dimension:
53 1/4 in. (135.26 cm) (object part, center back [collar to hem])
47 1/4 in. (120.02 cm) (object part, bottom of back [edge to edge horizontally])
91 1/4 in. (231.78 cm) (object part, across shoulders [cuff to cuff])
text: On the occasion of the fiftieth birthday of the Empress Dowager Cixi in 1884, several operas were scheduled during a two-week long celebration at the Palace of Eternal Spring in the Forbidden City. The popular play “The Imperial Birthday” had many actors playing the roles of Daoist immortals in crowd-pleasing costumes such as this.
title: Theatrical Robe for a Daoist Immortal
